Well the thing is I make these rips for personal use and I thought I should also upload them so other people could see these movies in a higher quality since no one bothered to make them.Initially I wanted to make them only for PC use but then I thought they should be compatible for other devices as well.I might buy one in the future and my movies won't work on it.I'll keep on trying and see what's what.
Also thanks for the support.I wasn't expecting a lot of people to give a F..K :))
Let's not hate on the man.He's the best at what he does and I hope I can improve so that my movies could be almost like his. :))
Well I'm a big movie buff so I try to make movies that are worth it and not just everything that comes out straight to dvd. :))
